notes:
# Cell Structure and Function

Cells are the basic unit of life. All living organisms are composed of cells.

## Cell Organelles

| ORGANELLE | FUNCTION | LOCATION |
| Nucleus | Control center | Center of cell |
| Mitochondria | Energy production | Cytoplasm |
| Ribosomes | Protein synthesis | Cytoplasm |

[IMPORTANT]The cell theory states that all living things are made of cells[/IMPORTANT]

[TIP]Remember: Mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell![/TIP]
